verses.verse: To the chaunter, a Psalme of Dauid. The Lorde heare the in the daye of trouble, the name of the God of Iacob defende the.
Sende the helpe from the Sanctuary, and strength the out of Sion.
Remembre all thy offerynges, and accepte thy brent sacrifyce Sela.
Graunte the thy hertes desyre, & fulfyll all thy mynde.
We wyll reioyse in thy saluacyon, and triumphe in the name of the Lorde oure God the Lorde perfourme all thy peticions.
Nowe knowe I, that the Lorde helpeth hys anoynted, and wyll heare hym from hys holy heauen: euen with the wholsome strength of hys ryght hande.
Some put theyr trust in charettes, and some in horses: but we wyll remembre the name of the Lorde oure God.
They are brought downe and fallen, but we are rysen, and stande vp ryght.
Saue Lorde, and heare vs, O kynge of heuen, when we call.
